column4: is it possible to mount a partition on a drive image? I did a 'dd if=/dev/sdb of=filename' now I want to mount what was sdb1 on that drive

is it possible to mount a partition on a drive image? I did a 'dd if=/dev/sdb of=filename' now I want to mount what was sdb1 on that drive. I tried this but it did not work: "mount filename mount_point -t vfat"
